name: Recruit and confirm the hiring committee
description: Identification and confirmation of members to serve on the hiring committee

name: Develop the job description
description: Creation and approval of detailed job description for the Executive Director role

name: Find and onboard an executive search firm
description: Selection and contracting with an executive search firm

name: Develop the call for the role
description: Development of job announcement and application process details

name: Market the call for the role and recruit qualified applicants
description: Promotion of the job opening and active recruitment of candidates by the search firm

name: Create long list of candidates
description: Determine which candidates make the top 12 + 2 back ups for interviews with executive search firm

name: Interviews and compile data on the long list of candidates
description: Conducting initial interviews and compiling assessment data on candidates

name: Review the long list data and select the short list
description: Reviewing compiled assessment data to determine short-listed candidates

name: Panel interviews of the short list and fill out rubrics leading up to selection of final 3
description: Conducting panel interviews and gathering detailed evaluation data to select the final three candidates

name: Community interviews of the final three, refining data in rubrics with community feedback
description: Conducting community stakeholder interviews of the final candidates and refining evaluation based on feedback

name: Deliberate and draft final recommendation
description: Discussion, final deliberation, and preparation of the recommendation to the admin board

name: Administrative support and HR compliance logistics
description: Managing HR compliance, documentation, and administrative support throughout the process

name: Official deliberation and close the contract
description: Formal deliberation and official selection of the candidate, including signing the employment contract

name: Decision communication and onboarding planning
description: Planning and execution of internal and external communications regarding the decision and onboarding strategy

name: Community memebers consulted for feedback on processes
description: Ongoing consultations with community members for feedback on the hiring process
